00029 #ifndef MODIFIERS_HPP_
00030 #define MODIFIERS_HPP_
00031 
00032 #include "AbstractModifier.hpp"
00033 #include <cmath>
00034 
00038 class FactorModifier : public AbstractModifier
00039 {
00040 private:
00042     double mFactor;
00043 
00044 public:
00049     FactorModifier(double factor=1)
00050         : mFactor(factor)
00051     {
00052     }
00053 
00060     virtual double Calc(double param, double time)
00061     {
00062         return (param * mFactor);
00063     }
00064 };
00065 
00071 class TimeModifier : public AbstractModifier
00072 {
00073 public:
00077     TimeModifier()
00078     {
00079     }
00080 
00087     virtual double Calc(double param, double time)
00088     {
00089         return param * sin(time);
00090     }
00091 };
00092 
00096 class FixedModifier : public AbstractModifier
00097 {
00098 private:
00100     double mValue;
00101 
00102 public:
00107     FixedModifier(double value)
00108         : mValue(value)
00109     {
00110     }
00111 
00119     virtual double Calc(double param, double time)
00120     {
00121         return mValue;
00122     }
00123 };
00124 
00128 class DummyModifier : public AbstractModifier
00129 {
00130 private:
00131 
00132 public:
00136     DummyModifier()
00137     {
00138     }
00139 
00146     virtual double Calc(double param, double time)
00147     {
00148         return param;
00149     }
00150 };
00151 
00152 
00153 #endif  //MODIFIERS_HPP_
